job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T07:23:41.000Z", "description": "

Computer Software Engineer \u2013 Virtual Internship

 

Great opportunity to apply your skills & talent in professional world at GAOTek Inc.

 

This opportunity is for you to learn in a supportive environment and put your skills to use because our interns take up real tasks and responsibilities as they are thoroughly trained in our experienced teams. We welcome applicants who bring in the spirit of dedication and hard work. If this sounds like you then I would love to hear from you!


Job Role:  Computer Software Development [ Virtual Intern ]

Location: Remote [ USA ]

Experience: 0 to 5 Years Only


Day to Day Responsibilities

  • Identifying areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing these modifications
  • Writing and implementing efficient code
  • Determining operational practicality
  • Developing quality assurance procedures

\u00b7      Maintaining and upgrading existing systems



 

Benefits of this Internship Include:

\u00b7      You gain real-world work experience at GAO Tek Inc.

\u00b7      Opportunity to learn real world people's skills, work ethics, negotiation, accountability, team spirit, multi- tasking and time management.

\u00b7      Opportunity to grow your network with our 500+ colleagues worldwide.

\u00b7      2 recommendations on the LinkedIn profile.

\u00b7      Three certificates: One Certificate of Internship and two certificates related to their training at GAO Tek.

\u00b7      Being virtual, this role allows you to work from anywhere at any time, that being said, you can commit yourself to everything you love to do!

 


 Please Note this an unpaid internship for the duration of 3 months

Interested candidates can

send your resumes at \"hr-india-teami@gaotek.com\".
